description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience the first game ever developed at California State University San Bernardino! Navigate 5 treacherous levels filled to the brim with enemies while using an exciting combination weapons system and three different space ships. Once you defeat the awesome Hard Mode, test your wits and your reflexes against the grueling Challenge Mode.. Amazing weapons and awesome enemies await!
